name: Ahoy.io
description:
Supports touch-screen devices!

If you face problems on touch devices, try using the downloadable version.

Gang up with your fellow pirates, or conquer the oceans yourself in this multiplayer massacre by shooting ricocheting cannons! Give us your pirate identification (username) and your ocean (closest server), and we'll drop you into the right ocean! Controls PC: (Keyboard/Mouse)

W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys - Movement

Mouse - Aim/shoot

Spacebar - Show/Hide Chat

Enter - Send message

Touch Devices

Touch anywhere and the game will detect you're on a touchscreen devices. An on screen controller will be available! Tap anywhere to shoot!
